title: Quadrantids Meteor Shower Peak
description: Peak of the Quadrantids meteor shower, one of the strongest annual showers.

title: Jupiter at Opposition
description: Jupiter is at its brightest and visible all night as it reaches opposition.

title: New Moon
description: Moon is between Earth and Sun, invisible from Earth.

title: Full Moon (Snow Moon)
description: Full Moon with traditional 'Snow Moon' name.

title: Annular Solar Eclipse
description: Annular solar eclipse visible in parts of Antarctica, southern Africa, South America.

title: Total Lunar Eclipse
description: Total lunar eclipse with totality lasting ~58 min.

title: Full Moon (Pink Moon)
description: Full Moon of April.

title: Lyrids Meteor Shower Peak
description: Peak of the Lyrids meteor shower.

title: Full Moon (Flower Moon)
description: Full Moon of May.

title: Eta Aquarids Meteor Shower Peak
description: Peak of the Eta Aquarids meteor shower.

title: Full Blue Moon
description: Second Full Moon in May (Blue Moon).

title: Venus-Jupiter Conjunction
description: Close conjunction of Venus and Jupiter.

title: June Solstice
description: Northern Hemisphere summer / Southern Hemisphere winter solstice.

title: Total Solar Eclipse
description: Total solar eclipse visible in Greenland, Iceland, northern Spain.

title: Perseids Meteor Shower Peak
description: Peak of the Perseids meteor shower, very active in August.

title: Partial Lunar Eclipse
description: Partial lunar eclipse visible across much of the world.

title: September Equinox
description: Autumnal equinox in the Northern Hemisphere.

title: Orionids Meteor Shower Peak
description: Peak of the Orionids meteor shower.

title: Geminids Meteor Shower Peak
description: Peak of the Geminids meteor shower.

title: Full Cold Moon
description: Full Moon with traditional Cold Moon name.

title: December Solstice
description: Winter solstice in the Northern Hemisphere.
